title: A treatyse made by Johan Lambert vnto kynge Henry the .viij. concerynge hys opynyon in the sacrame[n]t of the aultre as they call it, or supper of the lorde as the scripture nameth it. Anno do. 1538
author: Lambert, John, d. 1538.
notes: Running title reads: Johan Lambertes sentence, to kynge Henry the viij.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
